content.detailedDescription: Looking at birds in the sky looking at planes , when suddenly disc object traveling faster than any thing i have observed flew a same speed same line straight lower than planes
content.summary: Four objects seen hovering in sky.

content.detailedDescription:
I was getting ready to go to bed, but because i had early dinner i was a little hungry. so i asked my husband to get a few candies left over from the halloween.  while i eat them (3) i was sitting in the bed watching outside.  i have 2 boys 9yrs and 2.5 yrs, and they both have been sick for about a week with extremely high tempreture. so i have been sleeping with both of them in our guest bedroom.  while i ate i was starring outside at the sky which was relatively clear.  i saw aircrafts flying around with their blinking/non-blinking lights as usual.  since the sky was clear i continued starring at the sky and realized that one light which i thought was and aircraft light flying in the direction east to west hasn't moved for about 10min.  so thought why has that aircraft not moved at all, and payed a little more attention to it. it had gotten a little closer by then and i starred at it and saw it giving different lights (blue, red, green and yellow) now i felt even more curious.  continued to look at it.  my excitment grew deeper and i call my husband who was on his laptop in our master bedroom.  i call him over and asked to pay attention to this object, and after a few min. we realized this was an unusual object in the sky. like any other person, we both told 'what if its a ufo.'  but my husband doesn't really believe in ufo so we watched for some more time and the movement of the object was a little more clearer. now my husband was also curious, i asked him to get a camera (we don't have any high-tech one although).  but anyways, we got what we have and tried to zoom in and out excitment got even deeper becuase we could catch something in that tiny camera.  we kept talking to each other with excitment-may be its a ufo or may not.  but then what it this object.  i could record only about 20- 25 min.  2 reason- the capacity of my camera as well as my hands starting hurting.  it was difficult to hold the camera still for long.  i tried my best. but all the time i kept asking myself what is this object. it moved a little to the north and then rose up-straight in the sky and after about a 1 hr started drifting to the south.  i watched it for a 3 hrs, until it moved out of the range of my window.
i have recorded what i could see.  i would like to show this recording to someone who understand objects in the sky.  i would not call it a ufo unless endorsed by an expert.
please contact me for more evidence of what i have seen.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Revolving, rotating, hopping around sphere shaped object

content.detailedDescription:
I was standing at a doorway (facing east) of my workplace and was watching birds in the sky, then at 2:42 pm i happened to see off to my north at @ 55 degrees up from my perspective, a large passenger-jet (md 80 or dc9?) flying at altitude (@ 3 or 4 miles up traveling west) and a small greyish tear shaped object following closely behind at the same speed directly off it's tail about 1/4 mile or less.  i viewed this for about 7 seconds, then the small object behind it did an immediate left-hand loop and then flew north.  the small object did not change speed, but the glare from the sun when it turned made it look more round in shape.  i would describe it as a slight banking turn.  the entire turn-and-vanish trick took only about 3 full seconds.

after the small object finished the turn and went across it's own previous path, it instantly vanished from view.  i would describe it as a left hand, 270 degree turn.
the jet continued on it's way west and my view of it was obstructed by the building i was in.
unfortunately, i had a video camera that i tried to get to work, but the batteries were too low.
  
sky conditions: sunny, 77 degrees, clear, wind from south @ 12 mph.  winds at high altitude were from the north/nw. blowing about 50 mph.  the jet left a contrail that was visible for over an hour, but the small object left no contrail.  both objects were too far away for me to hear, and i work in a noisy machine shop anyway.
content.summary: Watched an object follow a passenger jet closely, then loop and fly off.

content.detailedDescription: While standing on my patio today on a clear day, i looked up, as i often do, because  airliners fly regularly on a path over my house (at high altitude).  when i looked up a small relatively bright object caught my attention.  it was motionless, quite small and almost glowed a white light with just a hint of red on one edge.  i walked back in my house, got some binoculars and tried to focus on it.  i was unable to get focused very well and i did not have a stable platform to keep it in a stable view. at this time i thought it was probably some kind of weather balloon or some other kind of balloon that had floated to a high altitude.  i stopped trying to see it with the binoculars, and put my glasses back on and looked at it again.  i was about to loose interest, still thinking it was some "normal" event when it suddenly began to move in a northerly direction.  it moved for a second or two at a moderate pace and then quickly picked up speed and rapidly sped away at a very fast speed.  it didn't appear to rise, it just moved at a very high rate of speed out of my field of view. it traveled in a very deliberate path and did not seem to float or drift.  it traveled much too fast to be anything like an airplane or balloon.  the altitude appeared to be relatively high, as in a few thousand feet, and the size appeared to be small.  from my perspective the size was about the same as a bright planet would look, but this object was being controlled by some means. i do no know how long it had been there, but it lasted about 1 1/2 minutes from the i first saw it until it moved off.
content.summary: I saw a small bright stationary object, which remained motionless then sped off.

content.detailedDescription:
On february 18, 2009, in the 8:00 pm darkness, my friend orlando and i were hiking the bike trail on the west bank of the san gabriel river (near whittier, ca). we started from peck road and proceeded north (toward the san gabriel mountains). when we got to about a quarter mile passed the pomona, (60) freeway, we turned back.

orlando went ahead of me, as he wanted to walk faster. after several minutes i glanced across the river to observe a scene that included the shadows of trees and various lights behind them; including street lights on the other bank in the distance about a mile away. as most street lights do nowadays they appeared almost orange.

suddenly, i saw what at first appeared to be one of those lights start moving toward the north (the opposite direction) in a more horizontal manner, on the other bank in the distance. it would have had to be very low to the ground for me to have to look twice to see if one of those lights was somehow moving, as if i were seeing things���i was.

this light appeared to be orange and very bright. as it moved it must have been ascending. i started running down the bike path toward orlando (because i wanted him, or anybody else to see this with me) who was by this time very far in front of me. it seems like i ran a long time. as i got closer and closer to him, i yelled several times for him to stop. when he did i ran up to him pointing to the object that was by this time floating high in the sky, and said: ���orlando what���s that? what���s that? is it a helicopter? jesus! is that a helicopter?��� he replied ���no it���s not���. we both observed it for a moment; it appeared to be heading somewhat in our direction. he said ���what is it?��� i said i don���t know. it was mesmerizing. i found myself taking steps forward to get a good look.

by this time the object seemed bigger and it had no particular shape. it could not have been as small as when i first saw it. it was bright and moved through the air slowly and appeared to change from orange to white and back; it appeared hot. it looked like a hot blob in a lava lamp. as we observed it was definitely getting closer. i could actually see flames; it was definitely on fire. i began to get frightened because it looked like it was turning toward us.

but suddenly, it appeared to stop about a half mile away, across the river near a power tower. it made no sound, it just burned. it was enormous. then it burned out. the fire ended. it was as if sections of it were burning off one by one. as it burned it was dropping what appeared to be the burnt remnants, but also it was silvery, as though it were liquid like molten metal.

as it burned away i tried to look in the area in the low sky where it had just been, thinking i���d see what caused the flames or if i could see anything at all. but i didn���t see anything else. also, there were no clouds were the object burned away, like there would have been if fireworks had exploded there. but no, it simply vanished.
content.summary: Fireball seen over 605 & 60 freeways and sg river

content.detailedDescription:
I'm writing because i saw a video online, a day or two ago, about a 4th kind experience the raised the hair on my neck. it was almost exactly what happened to me.I'm not totally sure what happened to me. i've always wrote it off as dreams. for about 7 days in the summer of 1993, i had this exact dream with virtually no differences. i'm writing because i saw a video online, a day or two ago, about a 4th kind experience the raised the hair on my neck. it was almost exactly what happened to me.

i would be woken up in the middle of the night. there would be 3-5 small (maybe 3-4 feet tall) "greys" (as i call them) that are around my bed. they never spoke to me directly, but i knew i had to go with them. they had the large black eyes, no hair or noticable clothing on their greyish bodies. 

i would be taken by these "greys" to a place that was very birght, almost like flourscent lights, but with no light fixtures anyplace. all the doors and the hallways seemed smooth. as if carved from a solid object. there were no sharp edges anyplace. after walking a few minutes, we would go into another bright room with a table in the middle. i don't remember seeing any tools or windows. the table was very cold when i was directed to lie onto it. 

another much larger "grey like" creature comes into the room and directs the other smaller ones to leave. this one is very tall and almost human like. he (assuming) reassures me i will not be harmed and returned home. it never spoke directly to me, he spoke to my mind. i remember being scared, but not terrified. he did tests on my reflexes, eyes, mouth tongue and ears that i can remember. i wasn't harmed in any way, as it told me. it also never told me why i was being taken. when he was finished, he left and the other smaller "greys" returned to lead me back.

it always finishes with the smaller "greys" leading me back to my bedroom and placing me into bed. i would wake up the next morning as if nothing happened. 

if these were dreams, they never were different. it was the same dream for about 7 straight days. i've told this experience a time or two and now i'm really curious as to what really happened. was i dreaming or in that middle sleep? was i taken? i'm sure you have recieved many stories like mine. i just hope maybe you guys/girls have some answers for me.
content.summary: Possible 4th kind

content.detailedDescription: The witness observed the event from the back of the residence.  it appeared as a dot in the sky.  it was located in a northwest direction from the residence.  the object was first observed when the witness entered the family vehicle and attempted to retrieve an item on the dashboard of the car.  the object was observed through the windshield as a red dot which was blinking alternating from bright to dim.  it appeared to be very far away.  the object did not appear to be moving.  the position of the object was at a 45 degree angle in the sky.  after observing the object for two minutes the witness came inside to try to get corroboration of the event from other family members.  this took approximately ten seconds.  when he returned to the car the object was gone.
content.summary: Observed a dot in the sky which was flashing

content.detailedDescription:
i would like if u could report it i would appreciate it. the address is 260 harmon r.D. churchville, ny 14428. it happened at my parents farm where i grew up. i am 31 now but was 10 at the time in 1988.
 i saw it in december 8th at roughly 8pm. my dad and i were walking up the road from the barn where we did chores (fed animals) which is about 100 to 150 yds from my parents. we were on the road almost to our driveway about 10 yds when my dad said he had to check on cows. so he left and then about 1min to 2 min later i saw a neon orange oval craft rise from what appeared to be the gully which is on top of a hill across from my parents approx 200 yds away. it rose from gully due south n then came north in about 3 seconds to hovering approx 3 to 4 ft above road. it took up virtually whole road. i would estimate 20 to 25 ft wide and 10 ft tall. it had an orange gaseous aura that enveloped over an apparent solid structure. thru center of craft it had glasslike round window portholes like that of a cruiseship  that couldn't c thru. it. hovered without noise for 3 to 4 min n then shot off thru two trees in a southwesterly direction n vanished several seconds later. i was about 15 ft from craft. i ran in as fast as i could to tell my parents after it was gone. several days later i was poked in the side by something that felt like a long finger next to bed by the window.. my room was dark n i could not c what it was bc had sleeping bag zipped to top bc scared at nite after sighting. i had dream i tried to yell for parents but couldn't get words out n felt paralyzed n remember dream about running from giant ufo and jumping into window with several other teenagers. several  yrs later in bout 97 saw multi colored lights in woods across from farm on relatives land green red yellow white while driving about 40 yds away. the latest paranormal exp was last hunting season in woods on land we have 3 mi from farm .Saw what i can only describe as little person 3 ft tall with white skin black almond native or asian lookin eyes but bigger without whites of eyes just black wearin camo hat like us. it had a small nose n thin lips my dad n buddys backs were turned but i saw it bc i was facing it. it looked like a hybrid mix . i have had a few more exp n many happened after saw ufo but some happened up to last nov when saw lil person
content.summary: Oval craft.

content.detailedDescription:
while smoking outside, i like to 'study' the sky and look for any high altitude air traffic and/or anomolies such as space junk re-entering the atmosphere, meteors, and watch for satellites passing as well. i observed what appeared to be a long cylindrically shaped object on a west to east trajectory at very high altitude travelling at a very high rate of speed and totally silent. the object had a 'soft blue' 'non-flashing' light at each end of it's 'fuselage'. this object went from the west horizon to the east horizon in less than two (2) minutes.
 after living near both an airport and air force base for 48 years,i am very familiar with the various configurations of aircraft nav-lights which is why this object grabbed my attention so quickly.
 this object flew directly over both will rogers world airport located in oklahoma city, ok. and tinker air force base located in midwest city, ok. i am quite sure that will rogers' a.T.C. saw this object on radar and due to the clear conditions they should have had a rather high 'seiling' or 'altimeter'. i believe that tinker air force base closes it's tower at 11:00 p.M. so there was probably no military detection.
 my thought was that this was not a domestic aircraft nor an anomoly!
content.summary: Cylinrical shaped object with 'soft blue' light at each end and no noise/con-trail went from horizon to horizon in 2 minutes!

content.detailedDescription: Noted a bright object in the sky at approximately 22:45 on november 5, 2009, south and east of covington la (would guess to be over the general vicinity abita springs, la) flickering (indicating not a planet), but not moving for 2+ hours.  after getting binoculars (tasco 10x50mm) to see multi colored lights (red, green and white) which did not move from its location.  no idea of size or shape really, though presumably large as it was high in the sky and some color was noticable by the naked eye.  could not determine shape of the object as i could only see the lights which seemed to flicker but only went off once for a split second then back on.  just very curious.  have never seen anything like this before, heard about it, just never seen it.
content.summary: Extended viewing of object via binoculars - stationary, multicolored light object in the sky.

content.detailedDescription: Standing on sidewalk in middleport talking with my mother and a friend of ours she graduated highschool with. i was listening to them chat and staring at the sky and all that was in it because thats what i love doing. it was dark and very clear. as i was looking up i seen the sphere  traveling across the sky and said hey look. my mother of 53 seen it, our friend of the same age seen it( he wears glasses), and i seen it.  there was also a commercial jet in the air at the same time we all compared it to. i have to say there was no comparison at all. it wasnt a satellite as my mother and our friend would not have been able to see it... i look for anything flying in the sky because im an aviation nut. i felt excited that i wasnt the only witness as i see these things almost nightly from my porch. my mother kept asking what this object was and i kept telling her i could tell her what it wasnt. anyways we lost sight once it got to far away to see. we started all chatting again...I looked up and another was crossing the sky in an entirely different direction. they both witnessed it along with me as well. i wish i knew what they were. i see them all the time, including the night before this.
content.summary: Bright white sphere's seen by mother, myself, and mutual friend.

content.detailedDescription:
I've already posted this by accident as a comment on the website. but i'll go into more detail as the night panned out. i'm one that does not believe in the supernatural, but there is no refuting what i saw tonight. 

i was doing a research paper for my friend who needed me to help him with his school work. i walked outside to take a smoke break and looked into the sky and saw a blinking star of various colors in sky. first, i thought it was probably a plane or a helicopter or something, but then it moved swiftly to the left, then to the right, then up. by this point, i thought i was just seeing things because i had been in front of the computer screen for much to long so i looked at the other stars and planes in the sky to see if it was just my vision, but none of the stars were as brilliant or changing colors and blinking like this star. 

so i went back in the house to grab my phone to call my sister to tell her what i had seen and then proceeded to go back outside to see if it was sttill there. sure enough, it was, but it remained still for a long time. i turned around trying to take my mind off of it and saw another bright star, more brilliant than the star that i had been examining for the past few minutes, and it too blinked several colors. i started screaming on the phone telling my sister that i had saw another when suddenly the more brilliant star moved swiftly to the left, then hovered for moments, and moved up. 

it was the wierdest thing, but i would have been content with never sharing that story with anyone other than my sister, it wasn't too spectacular, and i figured i was maybe just having an overactive imagination. then i looked back at the first star again and saw a bright light coming towards my direction through the trees in my neighbor's backyard. it had to be about 300 or so feet in the air, but it was a massive light and there were red lights and green lights on it as well. as it drew closer, i saw its silhouette in the night sky, and it looked to be a giant disk. it flew slowly and glided through the air. it made absolutely no sound, which was wierd considering that it had now come very close to where i was--it had to be about 100 feet or so away from me. my knees got weak and i became speechless on the phone with my sister who was trying to get me to talk about what was happening. it was massive, and the shear size of it scared the [cms/tg/pd] out of me. suddenly my sister stopped talking on the phone, so i said hello and all i could hear was feedback of myself talking. 

i kept talking, saying hello, to try to get my sister to answer. but nothing, all i could hear was my own voice coming back to me. i ran into the house, looking for some type of camera and grabbed my father's digital point and shoot hoping that i could catch it on video somehow. however, when i looked into the sky, it seemed to have shot off into the distance because now it was much closer to the brighter of the two blinking stars in the sky. it flew into that star and never came out. 

i know what i saw, it was no helicopter, especially considering that for whatever reason, there had been a sequence of police helicopters with spotlights surveying the area for the duration of the night at low altitudes. they were very loud and small when compared to the silent and large disk i had seen. 

i had always been a skeptic before, but i cant refute what i had just seen. it was the most amazing and eery of things. part of me would like to see it again so that i can tape it, but the other part of me would rather be completely oblivious to it all. 

i knew it was crazy, so i wanted to see if there was anyone else online that had possibly seen what i had. i googled, "ufo sightings in maryland november 6, 2009" and of course nothing came up, but this site was the first on the list. so, i've decided to post this story hoping that maybe there was someone else in the area that may have seen it, or have photos, or something to give me maybe a piece of my sanity back. 

i do want to set a disclaimer that your systems wouldnt let me set midnight as the time i saw it, so i set it as 1am. however, the sighting happened around 12:08 am.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: A disc like craft that made no sound flew in very close proximity to me.

content.detailedDescription:
It was 9 o'clock i just left my girlfriend house she lives in moreno beach. as i was driving down moreno beach  i was looking straight ahead but a bright yellow and orange sphere caught my attention, there was a truck there i thought that person is working on the electricity pole but it was odd to know that the object was going higher and higher but slowly 

the object was in the street of moreno beach  and alessandro right in the corner as i pass driving i thought to my self that person was not working on no pole so i stop the car and i look at the object still going up. the the most interesting thing happen it split in half  making two yellow and orange sphere i saw a car where i first saw the object near the ground and i saw people looking at it too

i drove to them while still trying not to loose the flying objects. i ask a male african american "what was that." he said" i don't know " thats when i knew it was a ufo as i park my car in front of his jeep i stop the car and look at it and there were both going two diffrent locations one going to perris and the other towards the riverside mountain.

*when i first look at the object i though it was just a ordinary light helping some one to see but it was not .

*the object was bright yellow and orange going at a speed of 5 miles an hour or less but it was slow to go up in the sky . the object then splits in half and make two object going two diffrent places i must say that the object going to riverside mountain had something coming out as sparks and fade away.

*i lose sight of the object by leave the area
content.shape: Blimp,   Circle,   Egg,   Fireball,   Oval,   Sphere,   Star-like
content.summary: An object being too low in the ground with a bright light going up and spliting in half

content.detailedDescription: i get to central park, to the great hill, the highest point possible to film the red craft flying back and forth. i stood there and watched it do crazy patterns. when i started filming this time, it hovers about then suddenly i descends near the reservoir. slowly and vanishes.  after about 30 min, when i got home, it popped up again for about 40 more minutes and morphed into a plane.. i know its sounds crazy but it did and i also have it on film..  its been out for about 4 nights so far...  for some reason it knows i'm filming it..  after 4 days of filming it you would too....
content.shape: Cylinder,   Diamond,   Disc,   Oval,   Sphere,   Triangle
content.summary: The red craft that popped up from nowhere descends in central park.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving down hwy 26 going west bound after work around 7:45pm.  i got close to my exit north plains/cornelius and i noticed this ball of light in the distance.  at first i thought it was a helicopter which i see many times when i'm coming home at night.  as i got closer i thought it might be a star, i wasn't sure.  many times i see this ball of light and as i get closer i see it's a helicopter using search lights traffic reporting for the local news.  i took the exit and continued to watch this ball of light as i waited for the stop light to change.  as the light got closer it split into two lights parallel to each other.  i continued to watch it and as it got closer the lights became three.  i watched the lights and a v shaped object passed over the over pass, not large about the size of a large airplane.  it was black and not triangular, like a v strip with a point of light at the tip and one on each tail.  i drove down north plains road and stopped and watched it as it went toward portland and it just got smaller in the distance.  i guess my question is, did anyone else see this?  you can contact me but this is pretty much all i saw.
content.summary: V shaped, black with a light at each point.

content.detailedDescription:
Monday night, november 2nd, 2009; about 6:30 pm. got to work (i'm a firefighter at a local helicopter facility and was standing by for their night vision goggle training) and as soon as i stepped out of the truck, i looked up at the sky. it was a clear, beautiful night, full moon, no clouds, not very dark, but enough dusk as to where i could easily see the brighter stars. one particularly caught my eye, and i said to my friend, wes, "hey man, look how bright this star is!"
wes looked and was just as amazed as i was at it's brightness. 
all of a sudden, it drastically dimmed. it went from the brightest object in the sky, to a pin point; but we could still see it. 
it was very high in altitude. 
as soon as it dimmed, it very quickly traveled north for approximately 10-15 seconds, then, without stopping or turning around, went due south for the same amount of time and then vanished. 
when we saw the object at it's brightest, it was stationary; i had noticed it for about 30 seconds before my friend, wes, had. it did not move until it dimmed. then went north, south, and poof, gone.   
i'm very curious as to what this is. i do not think it was a star, nor a man-made object. 
in my opinion, this was an intelligent aircraft that us humans could not possibly create. i've never seen anything move like that. 
thanks, 
jeremy p.
content.summary: Brightest star in sky. immediately and rapidly faded upon seeing. moved north then south

content.detailedDescription:
My wife and i were driving around talking with my two year old and 4 year old in the back of our jeep as we approached our road on 300s. i drove past on 900e so we could talk a little more and the kids could wind down. i drove approach a quarter mile south east of my home and suddenly i saw out of the corner of my left eye something large and bright. i have been thinking hard about this for a while and i guess it was so unusually that my first thought was to stop. i slammed on the brakes pretty hard enough that my boys were pretty upset. i said something to my wife like "are you seeing this" and see responded. that she was! what we saw was high in the air and a straight line of several large bright amber lights. this span was so large that i just knew there was absolutely no way i was looking at a plane. in fact there were planes in the sky flying at a much higher altitude due south probably from louisville airport and they look nothing like this. i would estimate the view of this object at the size of a football field in length. we slowly drove forward and after about a minute it was gone. i drove to the end of the half mile road turned around and kept my eye on the sky the whole time and never saw it again. it did not fade away it was there on sec and gone the next? as soon as it was gone i said to my wife "is that not the strangest thing you have ever seen" and see confirmed it was unusual. 

i really can't figure out what this could be we did have some military aircraft flying low about a month ago, but unless they were flying low and in a line and then shut the lights off i cant explain it. the aircraft we have had are osprey's or some variation i think..
the osprey's  are rather loud, we had the radio on so i couldn't hear anything. i have not seen any of these flying in at least a month though as training has slowed down. also as intent as i was watching i am pretty sure i would have made out the blinking lights. 

whatever we saw as either a massive illusion of several lights we thought were possibly one object or something very large. as soon as i got home i watched this section of the sky and for a few more minutes saw a lot of activity of aircraft and glimmers but nothing like what we saw before. i have lived hear for 9 years and watched the sky often and there is just nothing in the sky like what we saw. i tried to rule out barn lights or radio towers but there is really nothing in that section of the sky?
content.summary: Several bright low lights in straight line suddenly vanished

content.detailedDescription:
I was at home watching the areplanes come in, chicago has a lot of air traffic. i noticed objects much smaller than planes and disc shape, silver floating in the sky which distracted me. they were floating slowly in a south western direction for a few minutes since noticing them, suddenly they came to a halt and hovered stationary for about three minutes before ascending into the sky in the direction from which they came until they dissapeared. one other thing to note. i stood in my room with a very careful eye on these things so to see as much of them as i could possibly see and i noticed that as they ascended into the sky one (the one on the far left of my video) drifted away from the other two to the north. this was witnessed in the uptown neighborhood of chicago and the objects were directly over montrose beach at what seemed like approximatel 2,000 ft in the air. 

i suspected hang gliders and i suspected balloons neither of those could explain the behaivor of these objects to my knowledge. 

i felt excited and extremely curious about these objects because there is little evidence to suggest normalcy. 

when they were too small for my eyes to detect, may have gone beyon the cloud line.
content.summary: Witnessed thee silver disc-shaped objects floating southwest, became stationary in sky about three minutes, ascended into clouds until no longer visible. also drifted apart as ascended.

content.detailedDescription:
Standing on my back pourch i alway look up at the sky and watch the stars.
  thats when i noticed a bright star like object moving very slow. i watched it for about 3 minutes. i thought it was a plain but it had no other light or any blinking. it didnt make any noise. the object then started to speed up like a shooting star and was moving very fast i watched it for about a min. mabe less until it was gone.
content.summary: Bright star like object

content.detailedDescription: I was riding down a road i go down almost every day with my family.  one person in the car said "i see a ufo!"  i looked out the window and saw four bright lights coming toward us.  i didn't really mistake it for anything at first, i just thought it was a ufo.  it was about 150 feet above the treeline and quickly bearing down on us, but seemed to be going a lot slower than it actually was.  as it passed over us without a sound, i could make out a boomerang shape wider than the wingspan of a jumbo jet.  two of the lights were on each wingtips and the other two situated closer to the front.  after the thing went over us, we were too spooked to look at it again.
content.summary: Boomerang/wing-shape with four bright lights. completely quiet

content.detailedDescription: I was posing down on some rocks having some pictures taken of my stylish posing self. myself and my company didn't see the objects in the sky until we were viewing a slide show of the pictures that evening. in one picture there are 2 objects, and in the next, (taken a few seconds later) there are 4 objects...
content.summary: Ufo in background of pic.

content.detailedDescription: i was in my front yard working on my tree stand and playing with my dog.The dog is a black lab and loves to chase after low-flying birds.I had been pointing out tree top level birds to her as they flew overhead when i saw what at first i thought was a hawk diving after a mouse or squirrel.The object was at approximately 45 degrees when i first saw it,and i watched it until it faded into the distance at about the same elevation in the opposite direction.There was no fireball, no trail behind it, and no sound. i waited for several minutes expecting to hear a sonic boom and also trying to understand what i had just seen. it was bronze in color with a lighter gold or copper in the center. it was visible through a 90 degree sector of the sky and was about 20 degrees north east from straight overhead from my position.It covered the entire distance in about two or three seconds.Hold a quarter-inch bead at arms length and that is the size it appeared in the sky. afterwards, maybe five minutes or so, it finally soaked-in that either i had witnessed a very close call with an apparently large meteor, or i had actually seen a ufo. i was excited afterwards and since my wife was at work, i talked with my mother and sister about it.
content.summary: Bronze colored object streaked across sky from northwest to southeast.

content.detailedDescription: It was around 11:30 pm on september 26 2009,approximate date, and me and my friend went out to the front to have a smoke. my friends house sits on a hill so we can clearly see downtown from where we were. we walked down the street a little bit to light the cig,didnt want mom to know we were smoking, i looked up on the clear night sky and very clearly we could both see 5 fireball sphere shaped objects just dancing in the clear night sky. they were trailing each other like staying in a curvy line moving all around the sky. suddenly a one fireballs light just cut off which made it 4, and then another,and then another. they all cut off one by one until they were all gone. about 10 seconds after they all cut off they all popped back on at the same time until they all joined into 1 small fireball, i dont know how, and just suddenly raised altitude very very quickly until i couldnt see it again. im a believer so i automatically thought that they were ufo's. during the sighting all i could do was watch in awe because it was my first time seeing a ufo,actually 5. thats more then people see in a lifetime and i saw it in 5 minutes.Incredible!
content.summary: 5 fireball shaped objects dancing in the sky.

content.detailedDescription: I was on my way home from work going west on the route 30 bypass near the downingtown, pennsylvania route 282 exit, when i saw a speck of light in the top of my windshield directly over my car heading due west. at first i thought it was a shooting star, then realized quickly that the sky was covered by a low, dark cloud deck so it couldn't possibly be a meteor.  the object was heading due west at the most amazingly fast speed, made a sharp right turn as it neared the horizon, and disappeared over the nw horizon in less than 10 seconds from the time i first saw it. it was very low in the sky and obviously below the cloud deck, i would estimate at around 1 - 2 thousand feet up. the area over route 30 is an approach path for airplanes to the philadelphia international airport, so there are always planes in the sky, both approaching and leaving philly airspace.  there is also a keystone helicopter operation about 10 miles further west on route 30, so there are very often helicopters in the airspace also.  i could see both airplanes and a helicopter in the air at the same time i spotted the object.  it was most definitely something else. i've never seen anything move that fast in the sky, it was amazing. i would like to know if anyone else saw and reported it.
content.summary: Streaking star-like object over road out of sight over horizon in less than 10 seconds

content.detailedDescription: I work at the port of felixstowe, in suffolk, uk. while on the night shift i observed across the harbour and probably over hawich or clacton a brilliant light that illuminated the cloud as it fell through the sky. it was shimmering intensly and shone brilliant white and was exstremely bright. before i had time to react to the fact that it would hit the ground it stopped dead. it travelled at a huge rate of speed and glowed so bright. i would have first thought it was a meteor had i had time to think anything at all before it stopped ubruptly, a real sudden halt without slowing at all. the object continued to glow for severel more minutes before it got extremely bright and changed colour and then broke up into three red/orange glowing balls. the balls of light seemed to travel in different directions. from my veiw point at the docks, one travelled towards colchester or london direction, one travelled down the river orwell towards ipswich and the third travelled over the docks and i presume along the coast, i lost sight of it in the light polution from the port.
content.summary: A bright light burst through low level cloud at about 45-50 degrees and stopped suddenly without slowing down, just stopped bang dead in the sky. the object then broke up into three red/orange glowing orbs which each went in different directions.

content.detailedDescription:
Jogging in the park around 5:30pm,,, a extremly bright object emitted a strong glow ..Ball like in shape...,this caught my eye,,, as i looked up,, not far from the object was a airline plane with a chem trail. this object glowing had no chem trail,, it started to expand in size,, white/orange colour,,, after a second or 2 it retracted in size,, and vanished,,, only 2 reappear again and do the same thing,, expand,,, and retract into nothing,, as if it went invisable,, this lasted for about 6-10 seconds.

no sounds,,not much movement,, it moved only slightly it seemed,,, it was about the same height as the plane,, seemed like the same distance maybe,,, not close enough to the plane to be mistaken for part of the plane,, there was a good distance.

i have never seen anything like that in the sky before.

when i first looked at it, i didnt know what it was,, looked like a typical ufo shape and moved strange and was extremly bright.
content.summary: Very bright object made of light, pulsing, and growing large

content.detailedDescription:
I was watching tv and heard a loud aircraft overhead at aprox. 11:25pm on nov. 2, 2009.  for my neighborhood, this was an unusual flight path so i got up and went outside on my deck to check it out.  it was a medium size airplane heading towards santa barbara airport (ne to w/sw)  

i then turned around to look east and saw several small planes with typical blinking lights, and then saw one with two bright red lights blinking simultaneously coming in a straight line on a path that would fly over my house. the time was approx. 11:27pm.  

i went inside for 5 seconds and picked up my field glasses and returned to the deck, getting the aircraft into my field of vision.  i followed it as it went over my house, thinking that this configuration of simultaneous double red blinking lights was atypical for standard planes at night.  

it was not very high in the sky going over my house and it appeared to be of an airplane silhouette in the front half.  i couldn't make out any silhouette of the tail section. as it traveled west, i looked at the back of the craft. it had three big unblinking white lights, larger than any i have ever seen on an aircraft.  the lights gave the impression that the back of the craft was  flat (which may be why i couldn't pick it out in silhouette overhead) and overall shape of the craft might be triangular. the body was dark and blended in with the background of the night sky. 

i remember listening for sound. it was running silent. it was not flying particularly fast and it held a straight course.

i lost sight of the craft as it went past the hill behind my house about 11:30pm.  my feeling was this was an atypical aircraft of unusual design and mechanics.  i have never seen anything like it before.  i tried to research this as a prototype plane or something currently flying in our skies, but have come up empty.  if you know what this is, please let me know!
content.summary: Aircraft east to west, 2 red synchronous flashing wing lights (front), 3 big white lights rear in a row, silent, flew directly overhead, appeared to be unknown aircraft type

content.detailedDescription: this object was not seen when i took the pic. there wasn't any noise or aircraft in the area when i took the pictures.When i showed the pics around to some of the guys said they have seen something like it in afghanistan. i have seen white balls of light at night before but nothing like this thing.
content.summary: The object was not visible when picture was taken. there absolutely were no aircraft around.

content.detailedDescription:
I had been planning to have a bonfire in a field behind a barn behind our rural house, for my three kids. last night was a good night to do it: little or no wind, a bright moon to the east, and relatively dry conditions. after a late dinner ended around 7:20 pm, i got my three kids, aged 7, 4 and 2, all bundled up (temp was around 37 degrees), and drove my jeep out to the spot. i had the tailgate lifted up and a quilt set for them to watch me start our bonfire, a thirty-foot long accumulation of branches and leaves from the year. 

i routinely tell my son of my ufo and mib research, and at his urging, occasionally tell him ufo stories at bedtime. btw: other than an unusual red flare some years ago and numerous meteors (and one demonstrable hoax this past 4th of july), i have never seen a ufo before, and have never reported one. 

as the kids piled out of the jeep, unwilling to wait in its relative warmth before the fire got going, i happened to say to my son, "wouldn't it be great if tonight was the night we finally saw a ufo?" we inspected the sky to the south and southwest, where the open fields provided an unobstructed view. jupiter was clearly visible, and with the moon to the east and barely over the barn, it did little to interfere with the stars to the south. my son pointed out a series of flashing lights high in the sky heading west-southwest, and asked if that was a ufo. i assured him it was a normal commercial plane. 

but then, directly due south, we both spotted a strong stationary light, whitish-orange in color, at least twice the brilliance or more of jupiter and twice as big, seemingly hanging above a distant treeline a mile or so away. it had no accompanying flashing lights, and i would have taken it for the spotlight of a helicopter if it had been paired with navigation lights. measuring with my arm extended, it was exactly one finger width above the treeline, but other than the brightness and its color (whitish-orange, almost like a sodium-vapor street light), there was no way to discern a shape nor its distance. it could have been right above the trees, or it could have been a dozen miles away.

we both watched it for a minute or more, and realized it was not moving at all, neither left-right nor up and down. i had to attend to my other two children, and instructed my son to keep watching it. i marked the spot where we were watching (near two large tree stumps), and moved east to light the bonfire. my son reported a few moments later that it was still there, and that he thought it may have moved from right to left a small amount (heading east), but was still just as bright. 

i took about a minute or two to lite the fire and then turned to look where he had indicated, but the light had vanished. he turned to look south again and was amazed. he'd just turned for a few seconds to watch me, and then looked back and the light was gone. we watched the area and waited for a few more minutes, but there was no additional sighting of the light. the time from when we first noticed the light to when my son lost sight of it may have been as long as five minutes or as short as three minutes. i am certain it was not a commercial aircraft (too low on the horizon), nor was it a planet or star. and the lack of any navigation or blinking lights indicated it was not likely a helicopter. there was no sound. time of sighting was between 7:45 pm and 8:00 pm.

we were a little disappointed that it had left so soon, but were also a little excited that it was a possible unexplained event. when my wife joined us in the field with marshmallows a few minutes later, my son enthusiastically explained the event to her, but in a detailed and unhurried manner. the arrival of the marshmallows and the quick buildup of the bonfire soon diverted our attention.

note: we live less than a mile from a few industrial strip-mall type buildings, but none use sodium vapor lamps, and they all lie to the southwest and further west of that. there are no industrial areas to our south, nor any streetlights of any kind, for well over ten miles. nor are there any north-south roads that could account for the lights as being reflected headlights as vehicles travel uphill, and the roads around here are relatively flat for long stretches anyway.

note also, i've previously explained to my son the methods for determining the size and direction of any ufo he was ever lucky enough to spot, using his fingers and hands as measuring devices with his arm fully extended, to note the exact spot where he was standing and any identifiable trees or buildings to mark what direction the sighting occurred. his calm and attentive watching of the light made me happy he'd learned this well.

i understand that distant, undefinable lights don't make for a very interesting sighting, but i'm also aware that even a simple sighting such as this can help corroborate an event in a nearby location, such as albion, indiana (a few miles to our southwest), or fort wayne (around 30 miles to the south). another sighting could allow this one to be used to triangulate more accurately where such an event may have occurred. 

keep watching the skies!
content.summary: Unusually bright light low in the south, suddenly vanished

content.detailedDescription: An evening after fishing all day,cooking,a few beers.Sun down pretty clouds. close to nitefall.Saw somthing from left of lake.Followed it to us.About 20 feet above us.200 yards out.Shocking part was the speed.Estemit 15 to 18 mph. not enough for any.Air plane to have lift. ive built radiocontroled planes since kid.40 years. if you held a flatblack book and held it out lengthwise,that was shape. it had 4 lites that pointed downward.2 bright white and 2 red. cant rember which was in front or back.I understand about military drones and stuff were not supposed to know about. it may have been one. but what kind of gravitational lift system could it have.Ive seen many of your shows and have always been interested in this .But have never seen anything untill this event.I promise you if you ever contacted the other people with me, they would tell you the same facts.The only thing different from our sighting rather than what ive seen on your show, is that it did have a sound.As it passed buy and we were behind the tail or flatspot,it did have sound of very muffled somewhat quiet sound of a fan. almost like a smallshopvac.With the high freaquency,top end muffled down..Im not trying to be on your show. but this has completly changed my life.Hope its a stealth.Drone.If you hear anything that resembles my story.Could you please let me know. dave aldrich.
content.summary: 7 people in evening on lake with cliffs. just relaxing. looking out over lake.
